profile.profileDescription: Use this profile if you want a custome configured system for a fashion collection

label.name: Source of description
label.description: Source of item description. This should be a formal citation if possible. For informal sources a narrative description is acceptable.

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Coordinates documenting the location of the item

label.name: GeoNames
label.description: A Geographic lookup that takes search text, passes it to the GeoNames search service and provides a dropdown with search results (ordered by score). Selected geoname is stored as both text (name, country, continent and ID) and the service URL identifier.

label.name: Library of Congress Subject Headings
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Other identifiers
label.description: Any additional unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context.

label.name: Fashion period
label.description: Select the fashion period for the object.

label.name: Decade
label.description: Select the decade for the object.

label.name: Date
label.description: Enter the date or daterange for the object.

label.name: Electronic access
label.description: Enter the URL for the object.

label.name: Gender
label.description: Select the appropriate gender for the object.

label.name: Category
label.description: Select the appropriate category for the object.

label.name: Garment construction
label.description: Select the appropriate category for the object.

label.name: Description
label.description: Narrative biography for entity. This is the primary text used to document the entity.

label.name: Source of description
label.description: Source of entity biography. This should be a formal citation if possible. For informal sources a narrative description is acceptable.
